candidates.text: Documentation is scattered across 6 different tools

selectedCandidate: Documentation is scattered across 6 different tools

autopsy.originsConstraints: This process was designed when budget pressure was a real limitation. The original team built what made sense at the time. The tech startup industry had different pressures then, and the process reflected that reality.
autopsy.assumptionsWorkarounds: There's an unquestioned assumption that quality requires manual review at every step. Meanwhile, people have built workarounds: a 'special request' process that most work goes through.
autopsy.stakesOutcomes: Several workarounds have created informal power structures people want to protect.

workflow.aiDoes: Collects data from multiple sources, runs initial analysis, flags anomalies
workflow.humanDoes: Validates findings, adds context AI can't access, makes final calls
workflow.reasoning: AI excels at this type of work. Human relationships matter here.

workflow.aiDoes: Drafts communications, maintains consistency, handles routine updates
workflow.humanDoes: Reviews for tone, handles sensitive messages, manages relationships
workflow.reasoning: Routine enough for AI with this type of work. Consistency is the key value-add.

workflow.aiDoes: Runs all standard checks, compares against requirements, documents findings
workflow.humanDoes: Reviews exceptions, makes judgment calls, signs off on final output
workflow.reasoning: Quality requires this type of work. Judgment calls are frequent.

desuck.learning: Track satisfaction scores weekly. Feed human corrections back to improve AI recommendations. Review collaboration modes monthly and adjust based on what's working.

transition.humanElement: Start with the highest-volume use case. Get IT aligned before expanding.
transition.pilotPlan: Run a 2-week pilot with a single team. Measure before and after, then scale based on results.
